name: Casino VR Maschines Cardboard
description:
Welcome to the Mobile Casino VR. You can play mode, virtual reality and 3D.

★ Available games: ★

- Machines (Slots)

- Black Jack

- Poker

- Mobile Bingo

The game does not require internet so play our casino online for free, gain experience and get free bonuses. They are available in 15, 30 and 60 minutes. They are available in the menu. Walk up to them to get free chips.

★ free bonuses available in the menu: ★

- The wheel of fortune

- Treasure chest

- Safe

Our mobile casino VR contains various machines. Starting from the classic machines can unlock ancient Egyptian machine. Next are slots Wild West. At higher levels of experience you can unlock the machines in the style of ancient Greece with the symbols of the gods. For players who prefer a more classic themes prepared vending machines Zodiac signs and fruits.

★ Each machine can give you: ★

- Bonus treasure chests.

- Up to 20 free spins

- Bonus risk (draw cards to double the winnings of chips)

Random symbols on the 5 reels the machine and try to hit combinations to 50 lines. During the game you can win 5 in a line, large, mega, huge win.

When you gain a level, you can win free chips, diamonds or level of happiness. The level of happiness affects the winnings also try to get as much as possible.

Each game mode supports full virtual reality. You can play in VR and 3D when you do not have your glasses Cardboard. Play bingo, poker and blackjack 3d wherever you are.

★ Other interesting features: ★

- Daily tasks (exit them to get free chips)

- More than 60 achievements to gain

- Leaderboards to compete with other players

- Lovely royal design

- Music as in Las Vegas

- Mode virtual reality where you can feel like a real casino.

- Great design card games.

★ Requirements of the game: ★

- Use headphones for a better experience of the game

- Not all devices allow you to play in virtual reality. The game requires a gyroscope.

- Use Cardboard mode virtual reality.

Casino VR machines Cardboard is designed for adults. The game does not offer real cash winnings or in kind.
